comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: From en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gerald_and_Sara_Murphy "Later they lived at "The Dunes", once the largest house in East Hampton, built by Sara's father on 600 acres. By 1941, the house proved impossible to maintain, sell or even rent, and the Murphys had it demolished, and moved to the renovated dairy barn."
